entry.text: Damn monsters... They managed to split us. I must find my companions, but first I should fortify this position or we’ll not have a place to fall back
This might be enough to stop those vermin for a while. Time to find my comrades.
Does anyone copy me? I need reinforcements! They have overrun my position, I need backup ASAP. I repeat, I need backup ASAP!
Copy! It’s me, where are you?
Thank God! I’m close to your position, head towards the X (East, South, anyway), and you shall find me. Hurry up!
I began to think that was the end of me… Thanks, really. I couldn’t have done it without you
No sweat, but don’t think we’re in the clear, not just yet. We have to find the others.
They . . .****** killed the captain. . . ****** way too many . . . ****** need help
It looks like they really could use a hand over there. Ready your weapons, we better get going.
Damn that was close! I was about to run out of ammo the second you showed up.
Don’t mention it, you would’ve done the same. Here, I have some ammo to spare… you’re gonna need it.
It seems those damn monsters got to him before we could make it… Wait, what’s that? A coordinates sheet? What’s even there?
That was too close for comfort, but we managed to take out one of their hives. I’d call that a win.
Absolutely, just… don’t get used to it, we could have lost way too much in that assault
Good news everyone: I’ve picked up a signal from our mechanical combat unit. However, it seems to be right in the middle of a wanamingo nest. Yall up for some action?
I’d say it’s worth the risk… that machine is an absolute unit, it’d be an invaluable asset.
COMMAND::REBOOT --- … ---...--- RESULT::SUCCESS --- STATUS::ONLINE --- UNIT GOLIATH, WAITING FOR ORDERS
Hello beauty… we’re gonna have some fun together.
